Entries.Introduction: Oh... you're that new farmer boy, aren't you?^Oh... You're that new farmer girl, or whatever. Aren't you?#$e#Huh? Oh... I'm {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/HaleyName}}.#$e#Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be cute.^Hmm... If it weren't for those horrendous clothes you might actually be pretty... Actually, nevermind.$h
Entries.summer_Fri: I wonder what {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}} is doing today...#$e#Huh? I didn't notice you standing there.
Entries.summer_Sun: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} usually cooks dinner... But she makes weird stuff like quinoa.
Entries.summer_Sun6: #$1 HaleySister#I talked to my sister for a while last night. I actually enjoyed it quite a bit.#$e#You know, {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}'s not actually that weird. I guess we have more in common than I used to think.#$e#Don't tell her I said so.
Entries.winter_Sun: Will you say hi to {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}} for me?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Sun6: Um, if you see {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}} could you tell {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:L{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}} I'm busy today?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.Event_room1: {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/Him:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexName}}. But not anymore! {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/He:{{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/AlexGender}}}}'s immature.

Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I hope {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}} isn't too lonely all by herself. I should visit her again soon.$7

Entries.marriage_Mon.000: Hi, honey! I'm mostly just here to visit {{mardrest.ChangeDialogues/EmilyName}}.
